ComicInfo.Title: The Way of the Mercenary
ComicInfo.Summary:
Zombie Ice Man is HUNGRY! And Zombie Firebird is feeling peckish too. Mmmmmmm. A Slice of Dr. Betty sounds good ... with a side of Bill, Agent of A.I.M. You really think Deadpool is gonna let that happen? Cue gratuitous violence. Following Headpool's half-baked plan to get back to the "normal" universe, Deadpool and pals must first fight their way through the hungry of hungries. Which of Deadpool's compatriots gets zombie-fied? Tune in to find out. Same Deadpool-time. Same Deadpool channel.
Notes:
The cover is a homage and a parody of the cover of Lone Wolf and Cub #5.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:45:57. [CVDB216210]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Sebastian Girner
ComicInfo.Characters: Absorbing Man, Ashcroft, Bill, Agent of A.I.M., Deadpool, Dr. Betty, Firebird, Iceman, Professor Veronica, Sub-Commander Blake, Zombie Deadpool
